# MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle.CalloutStyle

**Enumeration**

The style to use for a map item detail callout presentation.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CalloutStyle
```

## Overview

In Swift, use [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKSelectionAccessory/MapItemDetailPresentationStyle/CalloutStyle/full] for map views on iPadOS and macOS. Use a sheet presentation to display full detail place information on iOS.

In Objective-C, use [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKSelectionAccessory/MapItemDetailPresentationStyle/CalloutStyle/full] for map views on iPadOS and macOS. Use a sheet presentation to display full detail place information on iOS.

## Enumeration Cases

- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle.CalloutStyle.automatic**: A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.
- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle.CalloutStyle.compact**: A compact, space-saving callout style.
- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle.CalloutStyle.full**: A rich, detailed callout style that is suitable for large map views.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Place information

- **MKMapItemDetailViewControllerDelegate**: The methods that you use to receive events from an associated map view controller.
- **MKMapItemDetailViewController**: An object that displays detailed information about a map item.
- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle**: The type of map item detail accessory presentation to use.
- **MKSelectionAccessory**: The type of accessory to display for a selected annotation.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
